ValidationRule.description: Group Plan Sponsor for Horizon Medicaid must be Horizon Medicaid
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c , "Horizon Medicaid"), Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Horizon Medicaid", Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Call Request" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The group plan sponsor for Horizon Medicaid leads must be Horizon Medicaid
